DisplayMode.descr: DisplayMode indicates the mode in which a page and/or its contents (e.g. text and web parts) are dislayed.

EnvironmentType.descr: An enum that describes which type of enviroment the framework is running in.
values: Indicates that the framework was loaded from a classic server-rendered SharePoint page

Represents the scenario of the framework hosted on a localhost server, which typically cannot access any SharePoint REST APIs. Example: A developer uses gulp serve command to test their changes in their browser of choice.
Indicates that the framework was loaded by a client-rendered SharePoint page
Represents the scenario of the framework hosted in a unit/integration test. Example: A developer running a unit test to verify changes to their web part.
